name: Litany (Selfish Dream)
description:
For eons, the Magi protected our world from evil.

But they were betrayed by their former leader.

Now a black plague of destruction roams the land.

However, one acolyte survived the onslaught.

Now he alone must brave the darkness.

Litany is a top down horror shooter with light RPG elements. Destroy your opponents and increase your strength. Acquire new spells that will help you survive the many perils lying ahead. Find your way out of each dungeon and reach the Gate of Shadows. Destroy the demons within and save mankind from annihilation.

Features

  • 20 stages
  • 10 enemy types
  • 4 bosses
  • 9 spells

The Betrayer must answer for his crimes.

The demon army must be destroyed.
